title: Drawing, Project: An organ loft and the organ with alternative suggestions, 1700–1725
title_raw: Project: An organ loft and the organ with alternative suggestions
medium: pencil, pen, brush and bistre on paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Horizontal composition of an organ and organ loft. The loft is supported by four consoles with small angels in the panels above them. The lateral parts of the parapet are concave while the central part is convex. It is decorated with an escutcheon with the representation fo David playing the harp. Two angels are on parapet stands on the left while three vases with flowers are on the right. The upper part of the central motif of the cresting of the organ case is missing. Legs standing between leaf scrolls are visible and the loft is shown somewhat from below. The uppermost part of the doorframe is also shown.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, Project: An organ loft and the organ with alternative suggestions, 1700–1725; Italy; pencil, pen, brush and bistre on paper; Mat: 27.1 × 19.1 cm (10 11/16 × 7 1/2 in.); Museum purchase through gift of various donors; 1901-39-2785
